categorytree.cannotdelete: You do not have access rights to move the selected content to trash.
categorytree.cantmovesystempage: System content cannot be moved or copied.

copy.operationexception: Failed to copy the content "{0}" beneath the content "{1}".

move.cannotmovecontentproviderparentpage: This category cannot be moved since the page or one of its descendants is a parent to a content provider.
move.cantmovepagetoitschildren: The content cannot be moved to its children.
move.operationexception: Failed to move the content "{0}" beneath the content "{1}".
move.pageproviderdeletecreate: Failed to move the content. The source content provider does not support removing content, or the destination content provider does not support creating content.
move.providerdoesnotsupportmove: Failed to move the content. The content provider handling this content does not support moving content.
move.requirespageprovidermove: Failed to move the content. The source and destination of the move operation belong to different content providers, which requires a special permission set in Permissions for Functions in Admin Mode.
move.title: Move Category

categorytree.moveconfirmation: Would you like to move this content?
categorytree.pagenotfound: Content is not found, it might have been moved or deleted.
categorytree.pagetypenotallowed: Content type(s) is(are) not allowed at the destination
categorytree.title: Categories

tooltip.notpublished: This category has not been published
tooltip.notvisibleinmenu: This category is not displayed in the site navigation
tooltip.pagelocked: You have not been assigned the user rights to make changes to this page
